Read more Read all questions about the golf course (1) Read all Q&A (99) Featured golf course amenities Golf course See all hotel amenities Reviews that mention golf course Read all reviews Write a review jjj2015 wrote a review Sept 2021 The Villages, Florida 47 contributions 53 helpful votes 5 of 5 bubbles Absolutely love LaPlaya! We could not be happier with our stay at LaPlaya.  The room, personnel, grounds, pool, golf course , restaurant, etc., were all exceptional.  Special shout out to Carlos Fandino at Baleen, Susan and Sergio at the front desk, and Andrew at Valet.  Everyone we encountered was top notch throughout our visit and we will stay again in the future.  Thanks for a great anniversary week! Read more Read less Date of stay: September 2021 5 of 5 bubbles Value 5 of 5 bubbles Rooms 5 of 5 bubbles Service This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews. 1 Responded 28 Sept 2021 Good Afternoon, Thank you for recently staying with us at LaPlaya Beach & Golf Resort and providing feedback from your visit. We are so glad to see you had an enjoyable visit with us and appreciate you taking a moment to let us know how everything went. We couldn't be happier to hear about the staff that helped make this a memorable visit and look forward to sharing your kind comments with them. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to the resort for a future stay. Wishing you all the best, Tim Herman General Manager Read more Report response as inappropriate This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Clint L wrote a review Oct 2024 1 contribution 5 of 5 bubbles Great couples getaway First impressions, the property is in great condition and  as soon as you walk in, you’re  greeted by the friendly staff at the valet stand and then at the front desk. Nikolaus became a friendly face that we saw every day passing through the lobby, saying hello, remembering our names and always asking us how our day was going. The front desk was always helpful and always ready to give a recommendation for whatever you’re looking for in town. We did have dinner at the restaurant on the property (Baleen)  which was phenomenal. They set us up on a table outside right on the beach so you could listen to the waves coming up as you eat. Food was incredible, and the drinks were just as good! Overall service between the restaurant and the hotel was way above expectation. The beach is amazing and they always had open chairs and umbrellas for you to go choose from. They have this great system where you raise a flag when you would like to order food or drinks so you’re never waiting too long. Drinks and food from the tiki bar were very good. The spa is very nice and the services provided there are top-notch. The golf course is in amazing condition and if you need to use rental clubs, they do have great rental clubs that are not 100 years old. Overall, we enjoyed our experience very much, no complaints and are looking forward to going back! Thanks again to Nikolaus and the rest of the staff that made our trip memorable and special. -Clint & Lauren Read more Read less Date of stay: September 2024 Trip type: Travelled as a couple 5 of 5 bubbles Value 5 of 5 bubbles Rooms 5 of 5 bubbles Location 5 of 5 bubbles Cleanliness 5 of 5 bubbles Service 5 of 5 bubbles Sleep Quality This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews. 1 Responded 13 Oct 2024 Dear Clint & Lauren, Thank you for choosing LaPlaya for your getaway and for taking the time to share this great review. We appreciate all of your kind feedback and are so glad to see that your experience exceeded your expectations. We look forward to the next time we get to welcome you both back for another exceptional stay. Carlos D. Macias cmacias@laplayaresort.com Read more Report response as inappropriate This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Chrissie C wrote a review Sept 2018 Naples, Florida 15 contributions 10 helpful votes 5 of 5 bubbles Corporate Golf Outing We hosted a Charity Golf Outing at LaPlaya and were all blow away by the team at the Golf Club that made it such a great day! Thank you to : Joanna, the Clubhouse Manager/Director of Food & Beverage, everything was seamless. Ben, the Head Pro and his team were fantastic and so organized. Chef Cheryl, Job Bani, Nick, Dick, Laurel, Dan, Tom, Kevin, John, Connor, Karen, Collin, Margaret, ken, Daniel, and Madeline. Thank you all very much! Alan Findlay, you have an awesome team! To top off this great event- we stayed at the LaPlaya Beach Resort and it was beautiful! Read more Read less Date of stay: September 2018 Trip type: Travelled on business 5 of 5 bubbles Value 5 of 5 bubbles Rooms 5 of 5 bubbles Service This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews. 1 Responded 24 Sept 2018 Thank you for hosting your outing with us!  We're thrilled that we could provide such memorable and seamless service for you and your guests, we certainly have an exceptional team creating lasting experiences.  We look forward to having you join us again! All the best, Ryan M. Read more Report response as inappropriate This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Siobhan A wrote a review May 2015 Bristol, United Kingdom 7 contributions 2 helpful votes 5 of 5 bubbles Perfect Location with friendly atmosphere, good food and great service. A delightful hotel right on a fabulous beach. All the facilities you could ever need. The food is good, the drinks are generous, the staff are friendly but efficient. We saw loads of amazing birds, dolphins swimming and jumping by the shore and turtles coming to nest. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would certainly recommend. The hotel is also a members beach/ Golf club so it does not feel like a chain hotel and there can be more locals than tourists which is great. Read more Read less Date of stay: May 2015 Trip type: Travelled with family Room Tip: Beach side is very close. Avoid an interconnecting room as you may hear the other guests next-door. 5 of 5 bubbles Cleanliness 5 of 5 bubbles Service 5 of 5 bubbles Sleep Quality This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews. 0 Responded 18 May 2015 Thank you for your positive review of our resort! Your review really touched on the core areas of hospitality that our team strives to provide daily, and we couldn't be more pleased with your kind comments. Additionally, we’re glad you enjoyed all the unique wildlife that accompanies our pristine location directly on Vanderbilt Beach. We actually just entered loggerhead turtle nesting season on May 1st, so guests over the summer may also be fortunate enough to encounter turtle nests along our private stretch of Vanderbilt beach. Thank you again for your review and recommendation of our boutique resort. We hope to have the opportunity to see you again the next time you visit Southwest Florida. Kind Regards, Chris Grossman Rooms Manager Read more Report response as inappropriate This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Discerning Traveller wrote a review Feb 2019 3 contributions 2 helpful votes 2 of 5 bubbles Disappointed - poor quality of room, amenities The room was dated, a one star bathroom in an ocean/Gulf view room. No water in an $800 a night room. We had bugs in the bath tub and on the bathroom floor.The Resort is  Beach and Golf resort yet the resort does not provide any transport to the Golf Course . And, guest are paying premium fees for golf. The staff for the most part were friendly and courteous but there were some who haven't realized they are in a service industry, For the price (expensive) the hotel does not live up to the price it charges. Read more Read less Date of stay: February 2019 Trip type: Travelled as a couple 1 of 5 bubbles Value 1 of 5 bubbles Cleanliness 3 of 5 bubbles Service This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews. 2 Responded 11 Feb 2019 Dear discerning2294, Thank you for taking the time to share feedback from your recent stay. If you will allow us a better understanding of what we could have done to make this the best visit possible, please contact our Director of Rooms, Brandon Tyler, at 239.597.3123. Your time is very valuable to us and we appreciate your willingness to help us improve. Kind Regards, Marco Perry Managing Director Read more Report response as inappropriate This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. 1 2 3 4 5 6 … Questions & answers about the golf course Read all questions and answers Ask a question Nicole B asked a question Aug 2014 New York 8 contributions 16 helpful votes Hi, Just wondering how far the golf course is from the hotel - in minutes - and whether or not the hotel can arrange for transportation. Is there a shuttle, for example? Thank-you! Answer from Chris_Grossman Naples, Florida 3 contributions Hi Nicole,

Thank you for considering LaPlaya for an upcoming trip to Naples! Our golf course is located about 10 minutes drive time from our resort. If you have a vehicle, it's a very easy drive. If not, we would be happy to arrange transportation through our concierge. Just let us know and we would be happy to assist. 

Kind Regards,

Chris Grossman
Rooms Manager
